Review Text: Loved the colonial style feel. Location is great. Rooms are large and very clean, though starting to showing some age and wear and tear. I was in a room on the top floor and heard very little from other guests in the hall or from their rooms. The nightly turndown service was a nice touch. Staff were friendly. Something to note - the aircon is very loud. Other reviews mentioned this too and this was also my experience. Pool area is small with limited shaded cabanas and pool lounges (which when I visited were in the sun) but does the job. The connected Cork Restaurant is not part of the hotel but they have an arrangement for room service and offer a small discount to hotel guests. I've been there several times on previous visits. The food is still good but I miss the old menu items. Would recommend to future travellers and would return, despite the noisy air con.

After the villa experiences, this boutique hotel was so comfortable. Not too big but not too small. Not super high quality hotel service but cosy and friendly and nothing was uncomfortable. I could have enough privacy and room service meal was ok. Bedding was good, storage area is big enough for long term stay, too. There is a open restaurant in down stairs and they have live performance every night so if you are too sensitive with noise, need to be careful to choose this hotel. We were happy to stay here and can recommend to people who stays in Sanur. There is no bath tub, so if there is a bath chair or something like that in the shower area, easier to wash toes and look after legs ( after walking and swim in the sea often needed to clean my heels and legs so I wished if I had a little stool or something inside of the shower which is made by plastic. This is the idea from current Japanese hotel called Remm hotel (have several branches and they focus on good quality of sleep the room is tiny but has good rain shower room ). Anyway thank you for comfortable stay.

This place has been the most amazing hotel. Firstly, the staff were incredible, always welcoming and attentive. They delivered a mini birthday cake to our room as a surprise which was incredible. The pool area is stunning, as per previous reviews it is not full sun all day, but you get most of the day has sun, and there is some lovely green foliage around the pools. The room decor is supreme, it is so clean, and every consideration is met. They also offer turn down service and leave a sweet treat on the bedside, which shows that they go the extra mile. The breakfast buffet is small but delicious and fresh. You can order food to the pool which is handy. Overall, an amazing experience and I will be back!

Very friendly staff who were very accommodating to our toddler. Good location and easy to access the boardwalk with the free bicycles for guests. Cork tavern is part of the hotel and has beautiful food, beer and cigar selection

Absolutely love this place.. üíï We had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The room was spacious offering a nice comfortable room. The staff were very nice and polite. The pool area was lovely. Great place to stay with family. Highly recommend this place to everyone visiting Sanur

Overall, I had a nice experience staying at Maison Aurelia Sanur. The room was clean and the location is quite central within the Sanur area, which is very convenient. However, I was a bit disappointed with the hotel‚Äôs spa service. I had booked a treatment expecting something more refined, considering the price I paid for the room. Unfortunately, the spa fell short of standard practices: they didn‚Äôt offer any selection of massage oils, nor did they provide a form to ask about allergies or sensitive areas before starting. The therapist also didn‚Äôt clean my feet before beginning the massage, which is normally standard, especially as I had just come in from outside and didn‚Äôt feel completely clean. Additionally, toward the end of the massage, the therapist moved on to massage my head and face without first washing or wiping her hands. This felt quite unhygienic to me, as her hands still had oil from massaging my body and feet. This lack of attention to cleanliness was quite surprising and, in my opinion, unprofessional. Therefore, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend using their spa services. That said, the staff at the reception and restaurant were friendly and helpful, which I appreciated.

What an absolutely fantastic hotel. Perfect in every way! Staff: delightful, friendly & professional. Housekeeping: meticulous. Loved the little biscuits, chocolates & treats they put on the bed as part of the downturn service. Really appreciated the bottles of water per day & coffee & tea being replaced during the day. Good to see the drinking water in supplied in glass bottles for the sake of the environment. Location: Maison Aurelia is located in the perfect spot. Lots of cafes, restaurants, day spas, pharmacies, a huge supermarket & convenience stores right outside your door. Close to the beach & Icon Bali too. No bus tour groups either. Hotel: Gorgeous swimming pool & spa. Well-maintained in lovely gardens. Plenty of sun beds & a few different pools suitable for the little ones. Meals are good-service is great! I enjoyed the live music. Such a fun bonus. Room: The Camellia room is huge & the bed is extremely comfortable. There is a choice of two shower heads. There‚Äôs a sitting area, a desk & a comfortable chair to relax on. There‚Äôs also a little balcony area too. Room keys & AC worked consistently the entire week. I enjoyed using the coffee machine & pods supplied. I highly recommend Maison Aurelia & will definitely be back next year. It is a brilliant hotel. Don‚Äôt hesitate to book!
Nice boutique hotel we love the family room it was spacious enough for a family of 4.. the overall decor is vintage.. breakfast buffet very limited but they have a la carte menu as second option

Awesome boutique hotel in the heart of Sanur. Walking distance to the beach and to many choice of restaurants. I love the spacious 36 square meter camellia suite with sofa seating area, very comfortable bed and pillows, balcony and very good sound proof window that blocked noises despite facing the street. It was a great 3 nights stay. Will definitely stay here again. Sanur is my choice of area now for quiet stay away from big city.

The most valued hotel. Very clean! The floor like spotless, no sinus allergy when i stayed there. Took the magnolia suites, the best decision ever for that price and the location. 1 living rm, 1 king size bed room and 1 twin size bed room with attached toilet in each room. The staff is super nice, prompt and helpful. Very very very recomended!

I was disappointed with the breakfast during my recent stay. There was no buffet, only one menu item allowed per person, and just one complimentary coffee or tea‚Äî any extras were charged. This felt quite restrictive and not in line with what I expected from a hotel of your standard. I hope you consider revising this policy for a better guest experience.

Just wow !! This hotel was our last stop of our holiday . We stopped from the 23rd August and checked out on the 27th . The location is fantastic, rooms are so spacious and very very clean. The staff are so lovely and there is nothing they will not do for you . Food is amazing üëè we would definitely stay here again and recommend it . Thankyou to you all for making the end of our holiday so lovely . Sarah & Dave Patchett

Our overall favourite of the four hotels we stayed at during 2 weeks in Bali. The Magnolia suite was spacious, clean and had good storage, although some general wear and tear marks throughout on walls particularly. The pool was never too busy with beds and loungers always available. What really separates this hotel from others was their professionalism, attention to detail, and clearly strong expertise in hospitality, balanced with Balinese charm. They provided many little amenities like free spring water machines on each floor, adjusting their food menu to cater for our needs etc which really added value to our stay. The staff were superbly trained in knowing what guests needed. The nasi goreng was simply the best we had in Bali. The only downside would be the relatively high cost of breakfast in comparison to restaurants on the doorstep. Location is superb, with a brilliant restaurant across the road and many others nearby. We would absolutely stay here again.

My recent stay in the Camelia room at Maison Aurelia exceeded all expectations. The hotel graciously accommodated my requests for a high floor and quiet room, which paid off with stunning views from the private balcony. The room itself was impeccable - spotlessly clean with an incredibly comfortable bed that made for perfect nights' sleep. What truly sets this hotel apart is its staff - from the warm, welcoming smiles at the front desk to their attentive service throughout my stay. They're always ready to assist with any request, making you feel genuinely valued as a guest. The location is absolutely perfect. While I didn't opt for the hotel breakfast (though it looked tempting), there are numerous eateries within walking distance. The beach is just a short stroll away, and having The Pantry store right across the street was super convenient for picking up snacks and essentials. Don't miss their spa services - they provide exceptional massage from their experienced therapist in their pristine spa facilities. The whole experience is guaranteed to be therapeutic and professional. Ideal for travelers who appreciate boutique luxury with personalized service. Will definitely return on my next visit to Sanur!

We stayed at Maison Aurelia Sanur for one night as a family of five (two adults, two young children, and a nanny) and had a lovely experience. The hotel has a warm, boutique atmosphere, and the staff were incredibly kind and professional ‚Äî especially when one of our children fell sick. They handled the situation in the elevator with such care and understanding, which left a very positive impression on us. Overall, Maison Aurelia Sanur is a wonderful choice for families looking for comfort, convenience, and a personal touch in Sanur. We would happily stay here again on a future visit.

This is THE perfect hideaway in a bustling Sanur. The rooms are well appointed and cosy in every aspect. The rooms felt like more premium with little touches that made it our most comfortable stay in Bali. The check-in in was seamless and staff were all well trained. They were polite and able to always handled a task with good demeanour. We had to change our payment method after partner used a different card than originally intended. Staff were able and politely in dealing with the transaction. We love the rooms and be quick to book, especially during peaks. We'd to be back when we visit.

Very happy with this. Rooms had good air conditioning with blackout curtains and very comfortable beds. Breakfast was included and that was really good. Convenient location to walk around Sanur. The pool was ok, nice to cool off but there are places with better pools if that's what you would prefer.

A wonderful boutique hotel located in Sanur with comfortable and clean rooms, walkable distance to convenience stores, spa, restaurants (try Batujimbar located right across the hotel). This area is close to kids attractions such as zoo, safari and bird park. The magnolia room is very comfortable for 4 pax, whilst the Camelia room is also spacious even with an extra bed. The staff are pleasant, warm and friendly. The breakfast choices are quite limited (small buffet spread - fruits, cereal, pastries) with a menu for ala carte order (1 dish per person). After 3 days, the option becomes quite limited. I would recommend this hotel to travellers.
Spacious rooms good location, impeccably clean, good service, good price restaurants all around, walking distance to beach.

Excellent, excellent hotel. Clean rooms and pool. The most courteous staff (except for when the bellboy rang the bell rapidly at 5:30 pm to inform us of the following day's weather report -- not sure why it was so urgent?) Extremely convenient location; most drivers in Bali know the place. They offer free cycles, which are helpful. Would visit again.

We loved this hotel! Fantastic service, food, location and value. The rooms were exactly like the photos, which is rare! The Magnolia suite has 2 bathrooms and a decent sized lounge in between the bedrooms, so it was perfect for a family of 2 adults and 2 teens. Location perfect for exploring Sanur. Would absolutely recommend.

Maison gave off ‚ÄúShangrila‚Äù modern living vibes. Within the hotel, the living space is spacious and items are where you want them to be.. it seemed to have been very well thought out as I need to work while the family enjoyed their holiday. I found the lighting, chair comfort, table size and even aircon (cool and yet with low wind) to be perfect - You know if you know. One handy tip is to bring a laundry line and string outside the balcony for drying clothes. Of worthwhile mention, their restaurant Cork is definitely a hidden gem. We experienced a 5* service and food suitable for families - The food, taste and presentation, and service staff is definitely a unique offering worthwhile of a visit if you are not staying in Maison. Maison also showcases art pieces for guests to appreciate. It was very wonderful to be able to read the what must have been going on in the artist‚Äôs mind and his rendition of Bali in his photo shoots. I minded though that towels were exchanged on a daily basis even though signs put up stated that exchange was done only if towels were put on the floor or in the bath. Perhaps a little less service and more environmental awareness please. As we ran out of the 1.5L mineral water we got from the nearby stores, the water dispenser‚Äôs bottled water also ran out in the middle of the night. Room service gave us as many water bottles as we liked the next day. We took 4 more than entitled and we‚Äôre grateful. Overall 6/5 stars for value, food and stay experience. Will stay again.

I have stayed many times at this beautiful hotel and I cannot fault it. Fabulous, friendly, helpful staff. The bed is large and very, very comfortable. The Cork restaurant has beautiful food. The spa is also well priced, and the ladies do a great massage. And this hotel is extremely well maintained. Fabulous location with the supermarket a minutes walk away. The pool is a great temperature, not Luke warm like so many. Loungers are always available. Few children. Highly recommend.

I had a very comfortable and nice time here especially since the two nights staying here I actually slept like a zombie! The room was very spacious to the extent of having two separate a/c units and controllers. The pool area is nice though the pool isn't very large but still usable. The gym is rubbish tbh with the single treadmill out of action and dumbells only going up to 15kg.. Some aspects to consider. I would only book a room only without breakfast as they only provide a continental buffet or a menu option for hot food and there's tons of amazing eateries everywhere anyway. Strangely no toothbrush kits are provided so worth noting. They do provide a free biscuit every night and turnover service. There are water dispensers on each floor for water. It's also only minutes to the beach side and everything is close by. Finally, there's also a usable balcony for each room.

I spent Balinese new year 2025 here, and it was a wonderful stay. Ms.Pratsna the staff at the Lobby was really kind and attentive (I'm not sure that I spell her name correctly or not) she gave me all the information about hotel service in Silence day and inform everything I should know about, she recommend the place that I can see Ogoh Ogoh parades. overall I love all the details in the room, plus with the super soft pillow

Yang Utama sy Amazed hotel ini masih menerapkan turn down bed dan kasih Snack gratis steleh turn down bed service, kamar dan ranjang nyaman dan bersih, hanya PARKIRANya sempit dan ribet di gang kecil dan kolam jacuzzi dingin ada beberapa keramik di siku ujung tajam agak berbahaya buat yang tidak tau, tapi overall sy Amazed, design kamar sy suka, almost done deh... Harga mungkin hmmm agak mahal 2,6jtaan tanpa breakfast, mungkin kalo kisaran 2jt dibawah dikit itu pas

Our room was large, comfortable, and very clean. The bed was super comfortable. The staff were wonderful. We travelled with our baby and they were very helpful with providing us with baby items we needed.

Stayed here for 4 nights on a business trip, and it was fantastic. The staff were very helpful during my stay, the room itself was gorgeous. If you prefer hotels with nice interiors, this place is for you. Tons of Balinese details around the hotel and the room. The hotel smells so good. The welcome drink (cinnamon tea) is delicious, the staff even taught me how to brew the drink. Breakfast needs more variations, though (it was probably because I stayed for 4x breakfast. It got a bit boring). Overall, it was a great experience!

Staff was lovely and often welcomed us with greetings. The decor of the lobby and rooms were nice. Room was spacious as well. One criticism is that there was only one working lift for all the guests. It seems that the other one was reserved for the staff as I saw they came out of it but it never worked for the guests.

Just had the most incredible stay at Maison Aurelia in Sanur, Bali with my family, and let me tell you, it was pure magic! Our spacious room was a dream - plenty of room for the kids to sprawl out, and the comfy beds ensured everyone slept like royalty. Speaking of relaxation, the pool was the perfect place to cool off under the Bali sun. It was clean, refreshing, and just the right size for splashing around with the little ones. And for those moments when you need a quick workout, the gym, though small, had everything you need to stay active. But here's the real star of the show: the service! The staff at Cork Restaurant were absolutely phenomenal. They were attentive, friendly, and always willing to go the extra mile to make sure our experience was top-notch. From delicious breakfasts to helpful recommendations for exploring Sanur, they truly made us feel welcome. Little touches like the complimentary bottled water and welcome snacks waiting in our room upon arrival made a big difference too. You can tell Maison Aurelia cares about the details, and it shows! This wasn't our first stay at Maison Aurelia. We actually came here during the pandemic, and it's amazing to see how this beautiful hotel has not only survived but thrived! They've clearly put a lot of love and effort into maintaining their high standards, and it definitely pays off. Here's my honest recommendation to all you travelers out there: If you're looking for a luxurious yet family-friendly haven in Sanur, look no further than Maison Aurelia. You won't regret it! P.S. Don't forget to indulge in the bathroom amenities - the shampoo and shower gel smell and feel divine! Trust me, after a long day of exploring, it's the perfect way to unwind.

What an incredible place to stay! Location is perfect for Sanur. The staff are so friendly and welcoming. The rooms are absolutely exceptional and so spacious. So many nice touches like they leave you a different Balinese treat to try every day when they fix your room and a card to tell you the weather for the next day. I really recommend this hotel if you want to stay in Sanur!

I remember the friendly staff and the smell of tuberose in the lobby. The friendly staff also provided a delicious Western-style breakfast. The pool was shared and many guests used it. Most of the guests were Australian and Korean family travelers. There are many really good accommodations in the Sanur area, but this was a really good hotel for the price. If there was one drawback, it was that there was a hot storage unit instead of a refrigerator, which was very disappointing. I had to drink hot water and drinks every time.

We stayed here over Xmas 2024 and it is a fab hotel, located right on the Main Street of Sanur, close to all the great restaurants. The rooms are huge and the beds are so comfortable- hard to find in Bali. We were so impressed, we booked for 2 weeks in August whilst we were there

Great rooms and location, but lacks in one area: the breakfast‚Ä¶ If there is one thing (sorry, one of two things) this very nice hotel falls short of, it is its continental breakfast selection. It is extremely limited, considering that I myself is very easy with food and only get several staples such as coffee and eggs. However, the buffet only offers hard boiled eggs (no other options - ordering other types of eggs meaning you‚Äôd have to pay more, and that applies to coffee as well). The suggestion is you could increase the price of the breakfast and offer free flow eggs and coffee on request, and that would really improve the overall experience. Currently it is really a let down. The other shortfall is subjective, but the gym is extremely tiny and also very limited in its equipment.

I really don't understand why anyone would recommend this place. I don't even want to give it one star. I was completely tricked by the reviews. Take a look at the drinking water provided by this hotel. Is this something people can drink? There were even hairs on the bed. The service attitude was also really bad. This is the worst place I've stayed at in Bali. I will definitely complain to the platform. Please don't come here.

The Maison Aurelia has become our go to hotel over several years. So much so that when we check in the super friendly reception staff always says 'welcome home'. The rooms are spacious and very clean and comfortable. The location is smack in the middle of Sanur with loads of restaurants and shops to the left and the right as you walk out the door. But, the reason we started coming back was the service. During COVID we became acquainted with one of the Supervisors named Ari. Since then she has always been very helpful and responsive with any booking questions, general Bali information and recommendations. I love the place.

My review on this: - The room: Spacious! That's the first thing I noticed. The bed was very comfortable and I slept really well. The curtains aren't blackout curtains so if you're a light sleeper that's trying to catch up with your sleep after a big night, best to get eye masks. The bathroom although it's on the smaller side, but it's really what you need. You're able to ask the front desk for amenities however it won't be something readily available in your bathroom. I love how they have turn down service. I always look forward to what snack they'll bring me at night. - facilities: I like how they provide water cooler on each floor! Such a good thing to have. The pool area is nice and it's by the restaurant - in-room dining: the hotel and the restaurant are managed by 2 different groups, hence you can't opt to charge your meal to your room. That was a bit inconvenient to have to pay every single time I order for food vs getting it charged to the room. - breakfast: breakfast menu was good and simple. I was happy with it - staff: the hotel staff are fantastic! Very helpful. and friendly. On the other hand, the restaurant staff wasn't as friendly. Overall, it was a great experience! Will come back again if I happen to need to stay in Sanur.

I really Do NOT recommend this hotel. If you love noise and lack of service and privacy, you can still stay here. They gave me a room right on the roof at the first floor saying it has a pool view. You can only see the roof from your room. And as windows are facing other guest rooms, you will not want to stay at the balcony. At night, you will hear quite noisy songs all over. Now, at 11 in the morning, they are doing some kind of construction right next to my door without informing me or excusing it. I called the reception but they would only say, sorry. Why do I have to endure this paying the same room rate with others?

I do not write reviews and this resort prompted me to write one. This is probably the best location in Sanur if you are looking for a peaceful vacation .This place felt quiet and peaceful through our entire stay. Very close to the airport and beach.. Staff members are also very helpful. Rooms are big and super clean with amazing design. Thoroughly impressed, highly recommended. well worth the money. Great Management.

This hotel has fantastic staffs. I stayed in well known 5star hotels too but never felt like so welcomed and well looked after like this one. Especially Ari. She was so helpful and kind. I could see her genuinely wanted me to have the best time there. Such pleasant stay. Wish i could stayed longer and i will choose this one again without hesitation.

I was here for a week, with one person ill the whole time. The hotel staff provided an excellent doctor who was able to start treatment immediately. The pool is shady which is lovely in the bali heat. It's about a 5-10 min walk to the hotels and restaurants on the beachfront and a 5 min cab ride to the new shopping centre. The hotel spa was inexpensive and the therapist was very good for balinese massage. I will be staying here next time.

Fabulous hotel, all the staff are super helpful and very friendly... Excellent location an easy walk to the beach, plenty of eateries just outside the door. The rooms are massive and very luxurious. The only downside would be the loud music from a couple of bars on the street but doesn't play all night..

Great hotel with a great location. Many good restaurants in close neighborhood, 10-minute walk to the beach, the hotel itself feels very new and has a nice local touch. We are having a great week here and if we ever come back to Bali, we'll stay here

We always stay here. Have for years. Service is impeccable. Rooms are great spacious and if you want a room that is divided for your teenager and one for you than this is a terrific hotel. CORK is downstairs and has a nice menu. One of the few places to get a large iced long black at 6:30 am so it is fabulous for early risers.

A lovely boutique hotel located in Sanur. This is my second time staying at the hotel. Spacious room and comfortable bed. Breakfast is tasty, however, it does not provide a wide selection of foods. Staff are friendly and helpful. If you're looking for a great value hotel in Sanur, and you are not looking for a resort styled hotel, then this hotel is the right choice!!

Good centrally located boutique hotel. Many restaurants within walking distance. Rooms were spacious, clean and well stocked. Breakfast was good too, and restaurant staff were very helpful and friendly (we didn't have this in our room rate but ordered a la carte which was reasonably priced). Good value for money - would stay again. Recommend if you aren't fussed about being on the beach itself.

I stay here with my family for a weekend, and the stay is great, room is comfy and large like a good boutique hotel. The location us great that near with other good restaurant. Will definitely come back again.

Great rooms, great service. We stayed 7 nights, and had a very positive experience. There is a restaurant and wine bar attached to the hotel. Good bar. Restaurant is good service and atmosphere, but a bit hit& miss with lunch and dinner dishes. Great breakfast though. Large rooms and quiet location, not far from the beach.

We stayed at the weekend. My family and I felt like we were in Paris. The rooms are furnished to a very high 5 star standard. The hotel is truly Boutique as they have less than 50 rooms. All amenities were excellent. The service impeccable. Thank you to Ari Cahyani for the welcome note and the fruit basket. Amazing service. All the staff are attentive to all their guests and greet you with a smile. Services long gone in some hotels ! Well done to the staff and Management of Maison Aurelia. We loved all the artworks. Will recommend and stay again.

We absolutely love it here! It‚Äôs clear that the team at Maison Aurelia strive for excellence in every way and their attention to detail is only exceeded by our appreciation. The rooms are beautiful and tastefully decorated (true to the photograph online), spacious and super clean. The bed is very comfortable and we always sleep well. The food is delicious. The location is also very convenient. Thank so much to all the staff for their, care, kindness and generosity! We truely appreciate all that you do everyday and the lovely energy you have created at Maison Aurelia. Thank you so much Pauline, Gusti, Ari, Prastha, Wulan, Popy, all the beautiful staff at front desk, the friendly and helpful door staff, the warm restaurant staff, the amazing house keeping team (my sincere apologies I can‚Äôt remember all your lovely names), and Ayu, the most wonderful massage therapist. We look forward to our next stay. Many thanks and best wishes!

This hotel was recommended by a friend around 4-5 years ago but I never got the opportunity to check it out coz I mostly prefer to stay in Ubud. The location is simply amazing! It is situated right across my all-time favorite Cafe Batujimbar, which is a great spot to grab a cup of coffee or a quick bite. Additionally, there are numerous shops, bars, and restaurants in close proximity, providing me with plenty of options to explore and indulge in the local cuisine and culture. Service is trully exceptional. All staff from door-men to housekeeping are very attentive and polite. They make sure our stay is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. Apart from the mattress that needs to be replaced due to wear and tear, The Magnolia Suite that we stayed for 6 nights was well-equipped with everything one would expect from a 4-star hotel. The attention to detail was impeccable, with thoughtful touches such as turn down service, slippers, and cozy bathrobes, among other standard amenities that made our stay even more comfortable and enjoyable.

Awal April 2022 bertepatan dg awal Ramadhan saya menginap disini dg keluarga, tapi baru sempat mengulas saat ini. Ke Bali setelah 2 th tdk liburan pas ke Sanur di jln Danau tamblingan masih sepi karena dampak covid, tapi hotel ini lumayan banyak yg menginap. Saya cek in mendadak karna rencana balik tapi ingin stay lagi di Sanur jadi saya langsung datang ke hotel udah sore namun resepsionis nya ramah & membantu sekali utk cek in. Welcome drinknya juga seger banget. Kita di hantarkan ke kamar dan semua fasilitas dijelaskan dg sangat teliti. Saya kesini dg keluarga serta mama jadi kita pesen yg kamar konekting, yg ada teras yg duduk-duduk Santai. Kamar lumayan bersih, rapih dan ada mineral, teko buat membuat kopi/ teh lengkap semua, minibar, kulkas kecil, peralatan mandi lumayan lengkap. Sabun beraroma rempah-rempah. Serasa banget di spa..ada spa berbayar. Berhubung saat bulan puasa saya muslim jadi kita utk sarapan request menu sahur dan mereka menyediakan menu pilihan ada Indonesia food dan Amerika breakfast. Interior disini clasik sekali banyak lukisan, dan bikin betah. Hotelnya tidak terlalu besar tapi nyaman. Kolam renang lumayan sepi ada Gasebo untuk Santai. Restoran makanan lumayan enak utk makan malam. Santai dan tdk begitu rame. Bila ingin ke ATM & supermarket tidak jauh ada Arta sedana tinggal jalan kaki. Ke pantai juga deket. Terimakasih buat staffnya yg sudah membantu kami selama menginap di hotel. Semoga berjumpa kembali. Pengin kesini lagi kalo ke Bali. Sukses selalu ya buat Maison Aurelia Sanur üôèüôèüôè

It's a friendly and fulfilling place. Especially I liked the breakfast that was ordered as a A la carte. I took out a star because there was a minor misunderstanding at checkout just because of the towels and gowns that they didn't fill as much as they collected. Anyway, I was happy to have a fun Bali trip here for a week.

Good property but not child friendly at all. I am staying with an infant and they make you come down every time you need to ask them to sterilise baby milk bottles in a microwave. They also make all sorts of excuses to avoid making pur√©es for a child and even charge for it. It‚Äôs not a question of money but who charges for and insists on immediate payment ( no signs to be added to the tab) for steaming and making puree of one apple! Good place but wasted potential.

We recently stayed at Maison Aurelia for a week as a family of three in a two bedroom suite. The room was a great size with two bathrooms. It was quiet and modern, and we liked the decor. The hotel pool and spa were fantastic and we made frequent use of the daybeds. All of the staff were friendly and helpful. It‚Äôs in a central location in Sanur and we wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay here again.

Fantastic hotel in Sanur. The cleanest place we stayed the entire time in Bali (Ubud, Lovina, Seminyak and Sanur). The service is off the charts. Super polite and helpful staff. One of the receptionists even contacted the bakery that supplies a cookie they give to guests so we could go buy some directly. Location is great as well. Easy access to the beach, restaurants and businesses. We requested a room away from the main street so our stay was also very quiet. Would 1000% stay in this place again.

This was one of our favourite hotels in Bali. The staff were very friendly and helpful always. The room itself was much larger than I anticipated, with a great sense of decor and the bed very comfortable. We got two water bottles, which were refilled and we could easily request more. They also gave a useful dental kit. The included breakfast was an option of Balinese food or american food and coffee/tea. We got time in the pool as well. It may have been slightly heated but it was a bit cold when you first get in, then you get used to it. The location was good, with a supermarket around the corner with ATMs and also a lot of places for food and salons too.

It was such a lovely boutique hotel in the middle of Sanur. Great location to delicious restaurants and coffee places. Beautiful rooms, with very comfortable bed and pillows!! Loved everything about the room : great lightings, sofa and amenities. I would def recommend this hotel to everyone

An impressive centrally located hotel. The hotel is new, so the rooms are fresh and no issues you commonly get from some of the older hotels in the area. We stayed in the family magnolia suite, which has the separated lounge room between a parent and kids room. Great set up and very helpful staff who treat you with professional courtesy. Absolutely recommend this hotel.

Love this Hotel! The location is great, the rooms are clean and fresh, the beds and pillows are the most comfortable I have ever slept on. Staff are fantastic and very attentive to all of your needs. Can't wait to get back and stay here again

Overall a very polished small boutique hotel. The staff and rooms here are the real stars. A special thanks to Gustu and Putu at reception. The only reason we did not rate service 5 stars was the inability to charge food and beverage to our room. With a hotel positioned in the market as it is I believe most guests would expect this basic facility. Having said that the food and service at the adjoining restaurant and bar was great!

One of the best hotels in Sanur. Staff and service are polite and helpful. Room is spacious, clean and well-decorated. They give adequate amenities, so no worry. This hotel owns CHSE certificate, it is safe for abroad travelers. Booked at their website for more promo and good price!

Menginap dua malam di sini karena tidak terlalu jauh dari pelabuhan dan kami bertujuan untuk one-day trip ke Nusa Penida. Kamarnya nyaman, bersih, dan luas (dengan harga kurang dari dua juta ini paling luas dari semua hotel yang pernah saya tempati). Sarapan ala carte bukan buffet tapi nggak masalah karena american breakfastnya lumayan enak buat saya. Staf cukup ramah. Overall it was a good stay.

Very nice boutique hotel if you stay in Sanur area. stay 3 night with very comfy bed , great hospitality. The turn down service provide local sweet delicacies : chocolate, home made cake , pineapple cake. Breakfast French style croque Monsieur with fresh juice . Room facing the Main Street but not crowded.

The hotel was clean and chic. I enjoyed staying there. my parents left their passports and 9000 dollars there. we called and they put it aside for us; so after 2 days when we returned we took it back.

Beautiful boutique hotel. Clean room with safety deposit box. Comfy beds and pillow. Strategically located in Sanur with lots of shops, restaurants, cafe nearby. There are three pools: for adults, children and one 'warm' pool (jacuzzi) but when we stay here, the water jet/water massage function is not working

Really nice setup, rooms are absolutely clean and spacious, quality is all around. Service at highest level. Will try the restaurant but after a discussion with the chef, a French cook, no doubt it will be stellar! I would certainly recommend!

The beds are THE BEST! Spacious modern room with decent furniture. The bathroom is compact. The pool area is the perfect size and quiet enough being as close as it is to the road. Loved it! PS if you are staying here and breakfast is not included it's only 100 Rupiah for a fantastic breakfast.

6 star service and effort! What impressed me the most about Maison Aurelia is the extra miles they took to make your stay much more delightful than just the physical properties. We were greeted with big warm smiles from the staffs, who were very helpful. The daily housekeeping and turndown services are done promptly and tastefully. They also prepared some local snacks / bites with proper introductions. The breakfast was very comfortable and I just loved their fresh watermelon juice, which is free flow btw. Every staff do their part with professionalism and heart. Keep this up!

The Magnolia Suite we are staying is very spacious and comfortable. I have found one of the safe boxes faulty though but it was fixed the next morning after reporting the problem to the front desk the night before. The air conditioners have been working perfectly and our rooms are very quiet. My whole family could sleep comfortably at night. The only restaurant in the hotel doesn't have a lot in the menu for us to choose from but all the foods we have tried so far are of very high quality. There are many restaurants and cafes nearby anyway we can always try something new everyday. The swimming pool and the gym are fairly small but we didn't use them so I don't have any comments. I have found the staff of this hotel extremely courteous and helpful. The doorman or the security guard always opened the door for us even though sometimes he was not close by. When it rained he brought an umbrella to our car so that we didn't get wet. All the staff I have come across so far always carry a smile on their faces. We have dined in the restaurant twice and now every time my family walked past the staff inside greeted us with smile when they saw us. Well done Maison Aurelia you have a fantastic team which make your customers feel at home. Keep on your good work!

This boutique hotel is amazing. I came here for business. It is a huge room, clean, nice balcony, so comfort pillows and bed, good rate, great toiletries product, lovely surrounding.. everything is awesome.

Clean, large modern rooms with the most comfortable beds and pillows you will find. Reasonably fast WiFi and plenty of TV channels. Friendly staff. Restaurant food good as is the attached spa. Nice pool, only gets sun in the morning though water is a good temperature throughout the day. Highly recommended.

(-) No water dispenser in the room or anywhere at the hotel - with so much mass tourism and consumption of plastic bottles it's a shame a hotel like this does not give an example but then promoting Earth Hour!? Only 3 bicycles available for this big hotel. Gym room is a joke and only one machine works. Swimming pool area only gets sun til 12/1pm. Whirlpool/Jacuzzi does not work and pool area is not that clean or maintained. (+) We stayed 4 nights and had a great time. Very friendly and attentive staff. Super comfortable bed and room. Those little special treats like chocolate were super nice:) Free bicycles (although only 3 available for the whole hotel and you must reserve in advance). Beach just 10 mins walk away. Lots of restaurants around.

I love stay here during my vacation in Bali for 4 nights. The room is so spacious, clean, and great interior design. The environment and athmophere is really peaceful, that's great for healing. The staff is friendly and complaints are handled immediately. I'd love to stay here again if I have a vacation in Bali. But, the breakfast menu is less varied. That's a bit dissapointing. But it's okay.

Sooo happy with my stay here! From the moment of my check in, until the check out. Everything went so great. They allow me to ask for more water, their shower amenities smells so damn good!!! I want to buy it actually, where can I get the family size of them üòÅ room was clean, pool was nice, and they provide the bike for guest, FREE! üòç ‚Ä¶

Maison Aurelia in Sanur turned out to be a great choice. It was approx 20-30 mins gojek ride from the airport. The hotel was also located within walking distance to multiple food and spa options. There is a grocery store directly opposite the hotel. As well as a supermarket and convenience store within 10-15 mins walk fr the hotel. Including a hair salon if you‚Äôre looking to get a haircut. The hotel is only 3 levels high however it‚Äôs clean and tastefully decorated. Upon arriving, we were greeted by the hotel attendant who opened the hotel doors for us. The hotel staff at the foyer were friendly and we were offered a nice and cold welcome drink during our checkin. During our stay, the hotel staff including the hotel attendant always greeted us at the foyer when we returned which made us feel really welcomed back. The room is huge and spacious. The room was clean and comfort. We usually request for house keeping when we leave for the day and we returned to a clean room every time we got back from our activities. We also experienced a pleasant surprise when we were given a complimentary small Indonesian sweet wrapped in Pandan leaves during one of the nights of our continuous stay. It was interesting to try. We especially loved the pool area because it was quiet and serene during our stay there. The pool water was a little cold but it was a nice place to spend a lazy afternoon beside the pool. Overall we have had no regrets staying at Maison Aurelia Sanur during our entire time in Bali and would recommend this hotel to our friends.

Fantatic is a great way to discribe Maison Aurelia. Rooms are large and spacious and very clean. Bathrooms are small but versatile. Staff are welcoming in the true Bali spirit. Pool area was quite and easy to relax in their lounges. Had breakfast at the Cork restaurant which was not included in reservation but was very well priced and excellent value. Evening dinners were also good but the bar next door spoilt the evening with its loud band playing for hours. plenty of other restaurants in the area for a quiter dinner. The Maison Aurelia is a 500mtr walk to the Sanur beach.
This worked brilliantly ..visiting family nearby. Friendly bunch, a/c worked well. Rooms large , quiet and comfortable. Large supermarket close by too
Fantastic place to stay, great food, rooms, facilities and most importantly all staff were amazing and made our holiday perfect.

Glad that we found this hotel, surely another one of the best hotels in Sanur. The Camelia Suite room that we stayed was great n spacious enough. The bed n pillows were so comfy. It's a pity that it didn't come with a hot tub. The room fragrance was also real nice. The coffee n tea in the room was of a different level. The shower gel, shampoo n condituoner smell real good. The staffs n security guard were all nice, friendly n helpful. The ala carte breakfast was also great n tasty. The food come with fresh fruits juices, infused water n Balinese coffee. Surely we'd love to be back here again next time. Way to go ...

Had a great stay here recently and stayed in their Magnolia Suite. Family of 4. Great experience from check in to our 5 day stay to checkout. Great location with good food around the hotel. If I were to name the areas of improvement... well, spa could do with extending the hours beyond 9pm. Apart from that great beds cozy rooms and friendly service all day.

The place is superb! It's pretty cool decoration. The place is quite clean the room was pretty big! Have small gym and small pool but it's okay. The breakfast have not so much choices but the taste of the restaurant! It's excellent ! The stuff very friendly and Nice!

Super recommended! Wonderful service and beautiful rooms. Good location close to the main beaches and restaurants of Sanur Bicycle renting for free, delicious compliments provided every day and so on.

Hotel beautiful. Location excellent. Rooms spacious clean and free toiletries replaced daily. Staff outstanding made us feel very special. Cannot fault this place. Highly recommend a stay here. We were there 16 nights
The food is the best here, will not disappoint. The rooms are spacious and the staff are friendly as can be. If you can I would recommend jazz night with some good food and wine

Hotel di sanur yg konsepnya menarik. Kamar luas ada balkon dan sofanya. Dekat dengan pantai sanur dan cafe disekitar sanur. Fasiltas kamar seperti sandal, air minum, teh kopi, sikat gigi harus meminta dulu ke resepsionis baru diberi, jika tidak minta tidak akan dikasih. Jadi jangan lupa untuk meminta ke pihak hotelnya. Untuk sarapan hanya terdapat 3 menu yaitu american breakfast, nasi goreng dan mie goreng, teh dan buah. Kurang bervariasi sehingga yang menginap dalam waktu lama akan bosan. Kebersihan kamar bersih, pelayanan baik. Worth to try üëçüëå

What a wonderful stay we had in Maison Aurelia! The room exceeded our expectations. The bed was honestly the comfiest bed of any hotel I've slept in. Dual air conditioning units kept the room nice and chill to our liking. Wonderful shower as well with all supplies you might need provided. The staff were so friendly and welcoming. Their constant smiling and greetings was almost infectious! How can you not enjoy your stay with staff like that!? The food and bar was also excellent. Great cocktails and tasty food. We ended up eating here 3 or 4 times during our stay and each time it was great. We would have eaten more if the menu had more variety. The pool area is super comfortable with beds and sun chairs available. The spa pool didn't work for the first few day of our stay but we very much enjoyed it for the second half. Bar staff often came out to ask if we needed anything to eat or drink which was welcomed! Nothing better than an ice cold Bintang on a hot day. Girlfriend went to the spa for a message and thoroughly enjoyed the experience. I can't comment on this much as I didn't partake but she had nothing but praise for her experience. Now after all that praise.. There was some small issues with our stay: The bath robes clearly had not been changed since the last guests as there was a large tea / coffee stain on one of them.. However this was quickly rectified the following morning when we had the room serviced after we left the bath robes on the bed. The fridge in our room can hardly be considered a fridge. It barely chilled our water and the milk we bought lasted less than two days before going bad. I made sure the fridge was set to maximum. Besides these two very small issues our stay was absolutely fantastic and I would not hesitate to recommend Maison Aurelia!

This is the only hotel that sent the birthday wish after a few days stay here one year ago. So, here we come again! We love the pillow, the atmosphere, the spa and the food in the Resto. Above all, the staff are very friendly. We have a great sleeping time here. This is already our third time of visit. Highly recommended.

Kebetulan saat itu hari ulang tahun anak ke-2 saya, staff front office nya sangat ramah dan membantu, dpt welcome drink berupa cinnamon tea dan cookies, mungkin cookies gula aren, sangat Spesial. Diantar menuju kamar oleh staff, dan dijelaskan sekilas mengenai fasilitas kamar. Di kamar sdh disiapkan beberapa balon, dan tdk lama kemudian dtg birthday cake yg sangat enaaaak.... Fasilitas kamar super lengkap, ada sound bluetooth jg. Sofa di tengah Antara TV dan bed, kursi santai di pojokan, dan kursi + meja di balkon. Terdapat kolam air hangat, kolam renang dewasa dan kolam renang anak. Ada fasilitas gym gratis, dan spa berbayar. Hanya sj sedikit kotor oleh dedaunan dan bunga yg gugur di kolam air hangatnya. Tp itu tdk mslh. Sarapan lumayan, waitress ramah. Disini anda bs sarapan di garden, kamar, atau gazebo yg disediakan di pinggir kolam. Hotel ini merupakan boutique hotel. Seluruh hotel berbau rempah Yg sangat khas dan mampu menenangkan pikiran. Saya sangat sangat sangat senang , nyaman dan berterima kasih sekali dengan pelayanan yg super dr hotel ini.

The good: - the room was good size and has a balcony - kept fairly clean and well kept - location is convenient The bad: - they are on extreme cut back on facilities, amenities and staff - you must request tea/coffee making facilities, and must remind them you need this refilled - you need to request daily housekeeping. The general rule is: no housekeeping is provided, unless you requested. - but when you call the front desk to request it, no one picks up. Kinda contradictory, no?! I called before taking a shower, after shower, after getting ready, right before I was leaving, and NO ONE picked up the phone. On the way out, I stopped by the reception and no one was there. A staff from the restaurant had to fetch someone from a meeting room. - on the last night, the complimentary toiletries were not replenished - we were provided 2 small bottles of water and was informed if we need more we could get from the water dispenser out in the hallway. But no water container was provided at all! At other hotels that has similar arrangements, there is large water contaner/carafe you could fill if you need extra water - I forgot to pack a shaver, and the hotel didn't have any, saying they ran out and won't be providing any anymore. This is an amenity that cost IDR1500 a piece! All in all, a good hotel is tarnished by extreme measures to cut back. What a shame!

Hotel room and lobby are very nice for value. Front desk staff is very kind. Breakfast was not good...it was a set menu with 3 options--no vegan or vegetarian choice. I tried to ask for pancakes or muesli + fruit but was told no. Also, there is no non-dairy milk alternative for coffee, just whole milk. For a hotel restaurant in Sanur we were disappointed.
Fabulous little boutique hotel. Ideally located walking distance to shops, spas, restaurants and the beach.

26 November 2018 staycation disini, booking Camellia Room dapat di harga 1.227.000. Experience nya unik stay di boutique hotel kayak Maison Aurelia ini karena Design Interiornya yang tematic ala Classic Colonial Europian, Lokasinya yang Strategis, dan Fasilitasnya yang lengkap, ada swimming pool, gym, jacuzzi, restaurant, dan spa. Ukuran kamarnya juga luas banget, ada living roomnya dan sofa di tengah ruangan yang nyaman banget buat lama-lamaan nonton TV. Dapat view balkon yang menghadap ke swimming makin kece kamarnya. Jarak dari hotel ke pantai batu jimbar juga lumayan dekat, cuma perlu jalan kaki sekitar 5-10 menit saja, udah sampai dan lebih rekomended kalau ke pantainya pagi, karena pantainya menghadap ke timur (Sunrise). Parkir Luas dan Vallet Service di belakang hotelnya. Full video review di channel Youtube ‚ÄúUPNOMAD TRAVEL‚Äù.

Stayed here in Sanur when returning from lembongan (usually stay in legian). Love it and think we won't be returning to Legian area for future trips!! Lovely places to eat nearby and food in hotel is amazing also. Beds are like clouds!! We got double room with living area in middle. Excellent for small family when juggling sleeps during the day!! We will definitely be back !! Note: construction has just started here for a new restaurant and will continue up to xmas so it will be noisy during the day beside the pool area
Staying here for family vacation. The room was clean, staff were really friendly. Great location as well. Definitely will come back for our next visit.

This is a boutique hotel concept in the middle of Sanur. The hotel has a modern charm with spacious room and comfortable beds . They also have family suites for group of 4 or 5 . The location is perfect with shops , restaurants, supermarkets and spa nearby
I love my room. Pros: Clean, neat, and enough space on the toilet. Cons: - Too much small cushions :)) - Just a few selections of breakfast

Mengunjungi kerabat yang sedang berlibur ke Bali mersakan sgt puas menginap disini. Tempat strategis dan layanan yang ramah. Cocok utk keluarga kecil. Nuansa hotel yang klasik dengan berbagai pajangan seni, membuat betah tinggal disini.

Had 2 night stay with family & absolutely loved it. Booked the camelia room and it did not disappoint. The room had super king size bed, 3 seater sofa & still felt spacious. The bed & pillows r heavenly! Food at the restaurant also yums. We had gulai barramundi & carbonara fettucine for dinner. Pasta was OK, a bit too sweet for me, but the fish was excellent! Must try. Hotel itself is located near the beach, closest one is Pantai Karang abt 15 min walk. A bit further, is Pantai Sindhu abt 40 mins walk. Overall, it was a great stay, thank you all Maison Aurelia staff

Beautiful interior decor with impeccable cleanliness. Friendly staff 24/7. Affordable proce with huge room size. Strategic location within the heart of Sanur and near really good restaurants. Really nothing much to nitpick about the property. Got the room without breakfast included but there are tons of breakfast options within a stone throw so you can change it up every day.

What a hotel! First class service from restaurant to reception to cleaning. Truly great rooms, we were fortunate enough to get a Suite for no money almost. 56 sqm and just terrific. Huge and lovely bed. Super clean bathroom which we were not used to after a few weeks in Bali. Restaurant is top, prices somewhat higher than neighbouring redtaurants and caf√©s for obvious reasons. Pool area is decent with awesome sun beds and towels free of charge. Haven't tried the spa but the variety of treatments is good. OMG the shower on the room is top 3 ever taken, especially after a long, warm and humid walk in the Sanur sun.

A hidden gem in Sanur; surprisingly affordable, easy access to the beach. It has that nice, boutique hotel feel. Staff is incredibly nice. And they give you a welcome drink you actually want to drink (not some lame ass juice from concentrate). The downside would be the breakfast - they could do so much better.

Nice food though not buffet style. Terrific room with very large bed and nice view, love it. If you are planning to enjoy Sanur at the night and thinking about best sunrise spot in Bali, this hotel is suitable. The location is so great. I recommend if you want to enjoy Sanur.
Near to the supermarket which is just 2 stone throw. Rooms are clean and pretty.. Every night you get some night turn down treats. Hotel is beautiful. (13-7-23)

Our 2 nights stay at Magnolia suite was superb and awesome. Mineral bottle replenish every day with chocolate souvenir and make up room. The service and hospitality were the best. Easy acess to Sanur beach, shops, mart and eating place. Able to arrange tour and car renting upon request. The pool opens till 21:00 hour.

Hotel dengan design menarik, sangat suka dengan ambience dan interiornya. Kamarnya nyaman dan luas, tempat tidurnya juga nyaman, namun saat saya tidur di malam hari saya mendapatkan gangguan semut di tempat tidur yang cukup mengganggu, saya tidak tahu asalnya dari mana namun semutnya menyebar di sekitar area bantal dan bed. Hal lain tidak ada masalah, staffnya sangat ramah dan membantu, fasilitas dan amenities lengkap
Favorite keluarga, kamarnya bagus, suasana menyenangkan. Kamar mandi bersih banget, handuk bersih dan wangi. Cocok utk family holiday.

Relaxing & wonderful. Staff were attentive and always serve with a smile. Plus the in the clouds bedding gave me one of the best sleep i have experienced from my many travels. Keep up the good work! üëç

There is only PROS when it comes to this hotel.... My kids and I enjoyed everything about Maison Aurelia, the staff, the breakfast, the pool, the location, the room and OMG the bed... felt like we were sleeping on clouds. Would definitely stay here again, im just guttered they were booked out otherwise I would have extended my stay.

Great room and style! Love the artistic design very much. Perfect for family with young children. The staff is great. Location is great. Food is everywhere. And we enjoy most of our time inside the room, haha. Will definitely come back again for longer time!
Great location in Sanur, well appointed rooms, would recommend

Very nice and lux place to stay. I love how it is located on Danau Tamblingan street, surrounded by cafes and other places to hangout. It only took 7 mins walk to the beach. Pantai Karang beach is the closest. Maison Aurelia provides Sensatia soap, shampoo and conditioner in each room. What a treat!

Great Hotel. The hotel management goes extra miles , such as a quality bathroom amenities, thick and soft towel. For breakfast, you can select what kind of breakfast you want from the provided menu. It is freshly made for you.

Beautiful boutique hotel ü•Ç right in the heart of Sanur, 5 min away from the beach and adorable outdoor restaurants. It is 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è. New, neat and clean - did stay here for 1 week only, strongly regret I wasted so much time staying in Canggu beforeüôà ‚Ä¶

Our stay at Maison Aurelia has been lovely. The staff is exceptional and the room is one of the nicest we've stayed in on our three week trip. The beds are fantastic. Easy to sink into for a great sleep. In the heart of Sanur, there are options of every kind within walking distance. Highly recommended.

Lokasi strategis di Jl. Danau Tamblingan, Sanur. Posisi sebelah barat jalan, menghadap ke timur. Pas bermalam di sini kebetulan ada Friday Market jam 15.00 sampai 20.00 WITA, semacam bazaar gitu, ada live music juga. Jadi kelihatan meriah. Hotel bagus dan bersih terawat, jadi sudah sesuai harga. Staff juga ramah, parkir mobil ada. Di sekitar hotel juga banyak resto, cafe, toko souvenir dll. Nyaman untuk berlibur bagi yg suka di kawasan Sanur.

Maison Aurelia Sanur berlokasi strategis di Jalan Danau Tamblingan, Sanur - Denpasar Selatan. Hotel ini menawarkan atmosfer menenangkan dalam balutan dekor kolonial serta dilengkapi oleh fasilitas moderen. I can‚Äôt fault this boutique hotel. Five stars for everything. I‚Äôm fussy. This hotel exceeded my expectations. Stayed for two nights and loved it so much so I booked in for another three.

Beautiful hotel. Big suite rooms (camelia). Everything you needed. Balcony. Television with a lot channels to choose. Great bathroom with rainshower. Very friendly and helpful staff. Easy to reach and park. Good location. Tasty breakfast.

Butik hotel yang sangat cantik yang ada disanur dengan konsep kolonial eropa dan bali. Kami mengunjungi hotel ini untuk acara night market, dan staf yang ramah saat menawarkam untuk melakukanuntuk hotel tour. Liburan nanti saya pasti menginap disini.

Nice Boutique Hotel The E-Bike Rental was the best for us. only talk to the reception or make your reservation direct at ebikerental.id under bookings. Sanur by E-Bike is insane fun and makes to move around easy without stress and no swetty. Specially as a couple or with a friend perfect!

The room was spacious and comfortable, and the room service staff were very friendly and helpful. I understand that the pool and gym are small, which is fine for a boutique-style hotel. However, the jacuzzi wasn‚Äôt working properly, and the bathroom was quite small, with the shower drain not flowing well. Hotel dengan fasilitas yg lengkap ada kolam renang, spa, dan gym. Hotelnya bersih dan nyaman untuk menginap. Staf sangat ramah dan sangat membantu. Dekat dengan pantai dan pusat hiburan di sanur. Harga sesuai dengan kamar dan pelayanannya. Saya rekomendasikan sebagai tempat menginap di Bali, khususnya di sanur area.

Terimakasih atas bantuannya dari kru FO. Saya booking melalui travel agen dan ternyata tanggalnya salah. Untungnya bisa dibantu untuk pindah tanggal dan masih ada kamar yang tersedia. Bisa pinjam sepeda untuk berkeliling sanur. Kamar bersih dan luas (-) Parkiran mobil sempit

Clean, polite staff, generous with water, coffee chocolates. The bed and pillow is extremely comfortable. Free in house bicycles. Next-door to fairly big supermarket. Food is everywhere from street food that'll cost you 20,000 rupees and expensive restaurant food. Generally most of the people I came in contact with are polite.

Very good design and very comfortable rooms, unfortunately some staff unhelpful even when we bring a lot of stuff. And when we ask for extra blanket but they give just a cover of blanket. Amenities by request.
Stayed here 6 nites‚Ä¶central location. Very comfy beds , large lounge area , TVs with 40 channels . Boutique hotel with very friendly staff. Free bicycle hire
What an amazing place!! Staff, room, location all above expectation! Beautiful pool area! We will be back. Absolutely loved our stay, no negatives at all.
This is a nice small hotel with friendly staff, nice cafe with good food. The only thing lacking is it doesn't have a view but then again it is a shirt walk to the beach.
Everything about the room is perfect, clean and large. Only breakfast need a little upgrade, need more than just two menu : nasi goreng and western breakfast ( omelette, sausage, bread )

New, clean and luxurious rooms. My only complaint would be the pool area was too close to the road and so noisy. And no private access to the pool (through the restaurant?). Otherwise I would stay here again for a couple of nights or as a stopover.
This hotel is amazing! Super clean, posh and comfortable. The bed is so nice and so many toiletries provided. Would definitely stay here again if I come back to sanur
I would totally recommend this hotel. The staff is like a family and friends to me and my colleagues. They are very helpful. Great bed, adequate amenities. Cheers to Maison Aurelia. Thanks guys.
Excellent experience. Rooms are beautiful and customer service is absolutely fantastic. Will come and stay again.
5* cleanliness throughout the hotels and the service was amazing and laudable! From the receptionist, to the cleaning stuff, restaurant waiter‚Ä¶ highly recommended for all touristüëçüèº

This is a very nice new hotel with comfortable beds and spacious rooms. The wifi is a bit unreliable in places, and the AC not very strong in the room I was in, but I'd certainly recommend it and plan to stay there again.
Our recommended accomodation in Sanur and we finally had time to escape for an over night stay last week. Just as good as ever. Always sleep sooooo good here.
